title: Paddington
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: Episode of Series "The wonderful world of Paddington Bear". Five exciting adventures from Michael Bond's lovable Paddington Bear. 1. The Browns find a bear at Paddington Station and name him Paddington. - 2. Paddington arrives at the Browns' home where he makes a big mess taking a bath. - 3. Mrs Brown and Judy take Paddington to the London Underground where he experiences problems with the escalators and station staff. - 4. The Browns go shopping to buy Paddington pyjamas but he confuses the shop window and the changing room. - 5. Paddington attempts to restore a painting hoping to find an old master underneath. He finds nothing and repaints it with marmalade!
related_objects: Series; S00554; The wonderful world of Paddington Bear; Active; 1975
